name: Metric Execution Environment
purpose: Securely compute and cryptographically attest foundational system metrics (S_01, S_02), ensuring strict compliance with the Metric Enforcement Criteria (MEC) before registering results within the L5 layer.

dependencies.name: SST_Proposal_Vector
dependencies.description: Operational input data required for metric computation.

dependencies.name: MEC_Quantification_Ruleset
dependencies.description: Cryptographically attested rules defining valid metric constraints and calculation methodologies.

execution_flow.action: Verify the H_MEC integrity hash of the Ruleset against the MSB Trust Anchor.
Execute metric computations (S_01, S_02) within the isolated environment. Results must pass ruleset traceability checks.
Generate cryptographic signatures for verified metric outputs using the MEE Attestation Key (MAK).
